function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Publication of non-peer-reviewed research","Impact":"Misleading information may influence decision-making and policy implementation, risking public health.","Mitigation":"Encourage critical evaluation of preprints, seek peer review before public dissemination, and note the non-peer-reviewed status.","Technologies":"Peer review platforms, preprint servers, and open access journals for rapid but reliable dissemination.","People":"Public, policymakers, and researchers","Owner":"Researchers, publishers, and scientific institutions"}]}
